body:
Hey guys, I thought I'd make a thread where you could post about any good movies you've seen or are excited to see!

*No spoilers please*

I would recommend:
  • Guardians of the Galaxy
  • 47 Ronin
  • Saving Private Ryan
  • The Lord of the Rings and The Hobbit trilogy's
  • Shaun of the dead
  • 21 and 22 Jump street
  • And more recently Mission Impossible- Rogue Nation
I'm so hyped for Suicide Squad, if you haven't already seen the trailer I recommend you watch it.

title: Movies

replies.body:
I'm hyped for Deadpool.
I'd recommend:

-The Secret Life of Walter Mitty.
-Hot Fuzz.
-Hangover.
-Juno.

replies.body:
yeah, ik this is old, but....

The Godfather

otherwise,
- Interstellar
- Shawshank Redemption
-  Mad max - Fury Road(kinda a 2 hour heavy metal music video, but still awesome)
- Kingsmen - The Secret Service
- 21 and 22 Jump Street
- The Bourne movies
- Gladiator

and I can't think of anything else right now

replies.body:
I am a huge movie buff
This year:
- Mad Max: Fury Road (maybe the best action film of this decade)
- Inside Out
- Spy
- Kingsman: The Secret Service
- Avengers: Age of Ultron

All time favorites(This list keeps getting larger xD)
- The Dark Knight
- Skyfall
- The LEGO Movie
- Wall-E
- Terminator 1 & 2
-  Avengers
- Captain America: Winter Soilder
- Titanic
- Birdman
- Inception
- Nightcrawler
- Star Wars(The reason for blockbuster films)
- Indiana Jones
